resources.string:
Hi, my name is Vishesh Gupta. 

I love Android Development. 

I am a huge sports enthusiast. 
I love watching and playing cricket. 
I can talk for hours about UFC. 
I love to play Kabaddi, Football, Table Tennis. 

I have a taste for soulful music. 
I do not watch movies or web series :). 

I love spending time with my friends and family. 
I love going to places and exploring new things. 

I also enjoy playing PC games, video games and mobile games. 
I love rain :)
